article_title: Our View: Florida fumbles health funding

article_metadata.description: When they started their legislative session in January, Florida lawmakers knew the state was about to lose $400 million in federal funding for hospitals that treat low-income patients, along with money for hospitals that treat a disproportionate share of people who can’t afford to pay their bills.

og.description: When they started their legislative session in January, Florida lawmakers knew the state was about to lose $400 million in federal funding for hospitals
